A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the worst StarWars movies I've ever seen.
Full if idiotic plot holes\, characters doing unexplained things\, no major story line to follow - in fact they went above and beyond to destroy any possible plot line only to make sure we get they are so woke and progressive.
Problem is\, they pretty much broke every rule in the Star Wars universe in this movie so I totally lost interest in this entire franchise after this.

And no\, I don't have a problem with the female cast - I actually liked "the force awakens" and had high hopes for this one only to be hugely disappointed.

By the way - I used "TomatoCalc" to get all reviews and calculate the real audience score... its says 45% on the site\, but only 12% of reviews are 3.5 stars or above.

So its actually more like audience score of 12%... not sure why rotten tomato is messing with the audience score nubmers...
